features: In 1 use thicker, fuller feeling hair
L'Oreal Paris Hair Expert is now L'Oreal Paris Elvive - new look, same amazing formula
body.description: L'Oreal Paris Volume Filler Conditioner is a lightweight and moisturizing conditioner that creates body and density for hair that feels thicker in 1 use. Paired with the L'Oreal Volume Filler Shampoo and hair treatment our system penetrates the hair fiber from root to core to tip for healthier looking, fuller hair. It works to create texture from within to generate a thicker feel, root lift, and lasting volume over time. Ideal for fine, thin hair types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy to have found this wonderful conditioner !
reviews.reviewText: I really appreciate this L’Oréal Conditioner. It is an excellent Conditioner for volume and thickening hair. I plan to continue using it. The size of the container is a very good value for its size. I am happy to have discovered this conditioner.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the volume it gives my hair!
reviews.reviewText: Its just the best smelling conditioner and has the volume I need.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Thin Hair is fuller now
reviews.reviewText: I like this conditioner a lot!I see improvement in my thin hair showing more volume and shine. Very soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty well, I have some tips though...
reviews.reviewText: I have very thin, wispy hair. Flyaway and thinning on top with 0 natural volume.So far, this L'Oréal Paris Elvive Volume Filling product has been the best I've found. But, I'm all ears if there's something better out there! I use both the shampoo and the conditioner.This is affordable and I am not one to spend big bucks on shampoo/conditioner. However, if there were a miracle product for my hair, I would probably spend A LOT more. Glad I don't have to.To correct some answers asked about scent: YES! This conditioner and the shampoo are scented! I hate scents of most kinds, but I tolerate this for the benefits and it is not overpowering. I am very sensitive to scent, to the degree that no one in my household can use scented lotions/perfumes/laundry soap. However, I do tolerate this well enough with no adverse issues like itchy lips,eyes,runny nose, rash. Nothing.Tips for this conditioner: If you aren't using cool water to rinse, you're not going to get the full effect and you may have issues with your fine hair feeling weighed down! Since I do not care for cool water in the shower, this is what I do:1. Apply this cream rinse after rinsing out the shampoo with warm water.2. Comb through my hair to detangle3. Rinse out conditioner with my favorite warm temperature.4. Turn the water to the coolest I can tolerate (not cold), do a quick rinse.5. Turn the water back to warm to warm myself up.You will feel a DISTINCT difference in how much condition is coming out of your hair when you use cool water.For drying, I towel dry and really rub it all over pretty welll with the towel, especially at the scalp. Then I let it dry naturally...and messy. That helps give the appearance of more volume on top. It tames down after awhile and looks really nice for that first day. 2nd day is not too bad. After that, I have to wash and towel dry again to have any volume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It really gives my hair more body!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great item - POOR shipping
reviews.reviewText: The product itself is great - the shipping was not - bottle opened during shipping leaking product - I could not believe they did not put any packaging in it whatsoever no tape no bubble wrap etc - for a liquid product you should protect it in transport with bubble wrap or tape or something - again great product - less than acceptable shipping - come on Amazon I think you can do better than that given your stature as a company

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Literally the only conditioner that adds volume to my frai
reviews.reviewText: This is the only conditioner I've found that actually creates volume in my hair lifts it up, the day aftershowering my hair is amazing, I've been mistaken for Keith Urban my hair is looking that good, highly recommend
